oshiSkill.name: ("Red Mic")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] If your Center holomem is Red, their Arts gain +20 power until the end of this turn.

spOshiSkill.name: ("Come on! Again!")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Put 1 Red holomem from your Archive to your hand.

name: Nakiri Ayame
extraEffect: You may put any number of copies of this holomem in your Deck.

name: Nakiri Ayame
collabEffect: Karma : Deal 10 special damage to your opponent's Collab holomem.

name: Nakiri Ayame
collabEffect: Ayame's first anniversary : If this holomem has a Poyoyo attached, your Center holomem's Arts gain +20 power this turn.

name: Nakiri Ayame
bloomEffect: You may Archive 1 card from your hand for the following effect: deal 20 special damage to your opponent's Center or Collab holomem.

name: Nakiri Ayame
bloomEffect: When this Blooms from a Debut holomem, look at the top 2 cards of your deck, reveal 1 and put it into your hand and Archive the other..

name: Nakiri Ayame

skills.description: You may Archive one card from your hand for the following effect: deal 50 special damage to your opponent's Center or Collab holomem.

extraEffect: When this holomem is Downed, lose 2 LIFE.

skills.description: You may Archive 1-3 cards from your hand for the following effect: deal 40 special damage for each card Archived to your opponent's Center holomem.

name: Shirakami Fubuki
collabEffect: You may return 1 Mascot from your Archive to your hand.

name: Ookami Mio
collabEffect: You may Archive 1 holomem from your hand for the following effect: send the top card of your Cheer Deck to one of your Debut holomems.

name: Irohanihohetto AyaFubuMi
ability: You can only use this card if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this one. Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems named <Shirakami Fubuki>, <Ookami Mio>, or <Nakiri Ayame> and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: Asura & Rakshasa
ability: The Arts of the holomem with this Tool attached gain +10 power. If this is attached to a 1st Bloom or later <Nakiri Ayame>, it gains the following effect: the Arts of the holomem with this Tool attached gain an additional +10 power. You may only attach 1 Tool to a holomem.

name: Poyoyo
ability: The holomem with this Mascot attached has +20 HP. If this is attached to <Nakiri Ayame>, it gains the following effect: when the holomem that this Mascot is attached to Blooms, draw 1 card from your Deck. You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.
